name: Turret vs the Goblin Kingdom
description:
Alt + F4 to close game

This game is unfinished as I got stuck on many things 😆

I hope you enjoy a good 5 seconds of Gameplay.

You spawn in with a million things happening so to give a simple rundown. WASD to move, Dodge red shots, Shoot Enemies with Left Click. They each have 3 health. If they hit you, you have a yellow block that appears in the middle of the floor indicating you are invincible for a short period of time.

How I incorporated the theme? I didn't finish it so I couldn't really add the fact that it was supposed to be a rogue-like game where you have 1 life to complete multiple stages.  I will be updating this game for future and hoping to make it at least playable soon!
